scripts.build:replace-packages-with-built-packag: bash -c 'for package in packages/*/package.json; do packagePath=${package///package.json}; mv "${packagePath}" "${packagePath}-old"; mv "${packagePath}-old/dist" "${packagePath}"; rm -rf "${packagePath}-old"; done'; pnpm i --no-frozen-lockfile
scripts.publish: npm --version && ls -l && echo ======================== && cat $NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG && echo ======================== && cat .npmrc && echo ======================== && pnpm publish --no-git-checks -r
